user_query: I'm planning to invest in the consumer goods sector and I'm considering Unilever. Can you give me a list of companies similar to Unilever? I need their names, number of employees, revenue in USD, and a short description. It would be helpful to have their logos as well.

TaskList.description: Retrieve a list of companies in the consumer goods sector that are similar to Unilever.
For each similar company, gather detailed information including name, number of employees, revenue in USD, short description, and logo.
